video.title: Battles - Kong: King of the Apes
video.synopsis: It's one quick battle after another for Kong as he tangles with T. rexes, pterodactyls and other high-tech monsters engineered by an evil scientist.

episodes.synopsis: Watch as Kong takes on a terrifying T. rex in the forest -- with nothing but his growing size as a weapon!
episodes.title: Trouble in the Trees

episodes.synopsis: While tiptoeing into Richard's lab, Kong awakens a fierce triceratops. Can armbands help him defeat the beast and dodge a storm of lasers?
episodes.title: Armbands: Factory Fight Out

episodes.synopsis: As Kong sneaks into the lab, he's outnumbered by Richard's triceratops. Can invisibility help him turn the tables on the charging beasts?
episodes.title: Invisibility: Factory Fight Out

episodes.synopsis: A ferocious giant squid is lying in wait under the Golden Gate Bridge. Will a jetpack be enough to help Kong defeat the robo-beast?
episodes.title: Jetpack: Wipe Out

episodes.synopsis: As Kong tangles with a giant squid under the Golden Gate Bridge, will his armbands be enough to defeat the tentacled beast?
episodes.title: Armbands: Wipe Out

episodes.synopsis: Looks like Kong picked the wrong spot for a siesta! Can the ape's mighty stink help him conquer the anaconda on the loose in Richard's mine?
episodes.title: Kong Leap: Mashup at the Mine

episodes.synopsis: Oops, sleepy T. rexes aren't the only ones lurking in Richard's abandoned mine. Can Kong's invisibility switch help him outwit the angry anaconda?
episodes.title: Invisibility: Mashup at the Mine

episodes.synopsis: With a hostile pterodactyl closing in fast, Kong unleashes one of his legendary belches. Will the mega-burp be enough to send the dino packing?
episodes.title: Power Burp: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: Cornered by a laser-firing pterodactyl, Kong is running out of options. Can his epic leap give him the upper hand against the beast?
episodes.title: Kong Leap: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: When a giant anaconda rears up out of the water, Kong has to think fast. Can a tree trunk help him put the snake in its place?
episodes.title: Tree Trunk: Jungle Smackdown

episodes.synopsis: Kong is caught off guard when a giant anaconda attacks. Can a jumbo boulder help him defeat the slithering beast?
episodes.title: Jumbo Boulder: Jungle Smackdown

episodes.synopsis: Kong's on thin ice as a trio of triceratops closes in. Can a tree trunk give him the upper hand?
episodes.title: Tree Trunk: Iced Out

episodes.synopsis: Kong may have some sweet moves on the ice, but he's outnumbered by a gang of triceratops. Can a mega-leap help Kong come out on top?
episodes.title: Kong Leap: Iced Out

episodes.synopsis: Kong is up a tree as Richard's terrible pterodactyls swoop in for another attack. Can his armbands save the day?
episodes.title: Armbands: Fight or Flight Rematch

episodes.synopsis: A pterodactyl is hot on Kong's heels. But they're both about to get a big surprise. Can Kong's jetpack help him score a sweet victory?
episodes.title: Jetpack: Fight or Flight Rematch

episodes.synopsis: Another epic fight is unfolding on the monorail tracks. Can kung-fu moves help Kong turn the giant squid into robo-calamari?
episodes.title: Kong Fu: Takedown at the Trolley

episodes.synopsis: The giant squid has its tentacles around Kong. Will the ape's famous power burp work on a monster from the sea?
episodes.title: Power Burp: Takedown at the Trolley

episodes.synopsis: The giant anaconda is sneaking up fast on Kong. Will the ape's armbands be enough to subdue the snake?
episodes.title: Armbands: Clash on Kong Island

episodes.synopsis: When a giant anaconda stops Kong in his tracks, will the ape's legendary leap help him conquer the beast?
episodes.title: Kong Leap: Clash on Kong Island

episodes.synopsis: As a T. rex storms through the streets of San Francisco, can Kong's invisible tricks bring the beast to its knees?
episodes.title: Invisibility: Street Fighter

episodes.synopsis: With a T. rex on the loose in the city, it's up to Kong to save the day. Will his jetpack give him the edge he needs to stop the beast in its tracks?
episodes.title: Jetpack: Street Fighter

episodes.synopsis: A swarm of robosquitos turns Kong's quiet fishing trip into a wild chase. Can a jetpack help Kong shoo the pests away?
episodes.title: Jetpack: Bugging Out

episodes.synopsis: Unwelcome visitors are headed straight for Kong's peaceful meditation spot. See what happens when he unleashes his kung fu moves on the swarm!
episodes.title: Kong Fu: Bugging Out

episodes.synopsis: Dinosaurs, sharks and squid, oh my! Cheer Kong on as he dives in for one last epic battle against all his enemies.
episodes.title: Mega Kong: Total Knockout
